_header: A thorn hath pierced my heart right sore
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 42.
_description: No remedy for falling in love — three 5-line stanzas and introductory 2-line burden

BLAdd31922.First Lines: A thorn hath percyd my hart ryght sorewhich daly encressith more & more…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …for which my hart is lyk to brestwhat remedy what remedy such is fortune what remedy
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated twice more for three voices.
